overview: A retiring clown finds himself confined to his apartment. Ravaged by hunger and boredom, he tries to satisfy his various appetites. After hitting his nose on an empty fridge, a predictable fall on a slippery banana peel pushes him towards his last visceral urges. The overwhelmed clown will seek a way out, among a relentless cycle of forced jokes. Monsieur Sachet is a wicked escalation of tragicomic anecdotes happening in a colorful, crazy and completely absurd atmosphere.
title: Monsieur Sachet
